title: HubSpot Assistant
job_overview:
I We are looking for a HubSpot expert.

You will need to be able to setup HubSpot instance from scratch such that the platform works for:

-attribution
lead scoring
create workflows both standard and non standard (custom)

Note: we need someone who really understands how to extract the value in HubSpot, not sopmeone who can just make changes to an existing instance.
